page.title: 06THE JOB CENTRE
page.content: In Barton during May 1985{1015}people were{unemployed.}Some adults over the age of 18 will use the services of their local{Job Centre.} The Job Centre asks local businesses if they have any{vacancies}.The vacancies are displayed in its windows.Once a person finds a suitable vacancy the Job Centre arranges an interview between the two interested parties .The most popular types of {employment}are:cleaning, office work, secretarial,construction and vacancies in the Chemical Industry. Although Barton is surrounded by farm land there were few vacancies in the agricultural industry. In 1984 the Job Centre advertised 787 vacancies and 622 were filled.
